editorialSummary.text: Simple rooms in an unassuming hotel offering a restaurant, an outdoor pool & a playground.

text.text: The hotel stay was comfortable and enjoyable. The room was clean and well-equipped with all necessary amenities. The staff was friendly and attentive, providing excellent service throughout the stay. The location was convenient, with easy access to nearby attractions and transportation options.  However, the Wi-Fi connection could have been more reliable at times. Overall, it was a pleasant stay and I would recommend the hotel to others.

originalText.text: The hotel stay was comfortable and enjoyable. The room was clean and well-equipped with all necessary amenities. The staff was friendly and attentive, providing excellent service throughout the stay. The location was convenient, with easy access to nearby attractions and transportation options.  However, the Wi-Fi connection could have been more reliable at times. Overall, it was a pleasant stay and I would recommend the hotel to others.

text.text:
Nestled in the heart of Bhavani, Hotel Paviesh Park offers a serene and comfortable stay for travelers seeking a peaceful retreat. The hotel's prime location provides easy access to local attractions while ensuring a quiet ambiance for a relaxing stay.

The rooms are spacious, well-appointed, and equipped with modern amenities to cater to the needs of both leisure and business travelers. The hotel's courteous staff is always ready to assist, ensuring a pleasant and hassle-free stay for guests.

Guests can indulge in delicious meals at the hotel's restaurant, which offers a variety of dishes to suit every palate. The hotel also features a well-equipped fitness center, perfect for guests looking to stay active during their stay.

Overall, Hotel Paviesh Park offers excellent value for money with its comfortable rooms, convenient location, and friendly service. Whether you're in Bhavani for business or leisure, this hotel is a great choice for a memorable stay.

Guests can indulge in delicious meals at the hotel's restaurant, which offers a variety of dishes to suit every palate. The hotel also features a well-equipped fitness center, perfect for guests looking to stay active during their stay.

Overall, Hotel Paviesh Park offers excellent value for money with its comfortable rooms, convenient location, and friendly service. Whether you're in Bhavani for business or leisure, this hotel is a great choice for a memorable stay.

text.text: We just dined there in the lawn and did not stay. We were not happy with the unclean banana leaf and wiped off the dirt. The food was ok ok…nothing to appreciate. The place has birds and we saw goose walking on the lawn eating food littered off purposely by cleaning staff…I even saw goose eating left over food directly from plates kept in the lawn.

text.text:
It is a lodge with average facilities but located close to the temple as well as the bustand in Bhavani. The room sizes are small, cleanliness and maintenance of the rooms are okay. Hot water is available for 24hrs (during our stay) which is a plus point. Other than this there is zero features and zero service.
There is no lift facilities, no parking space, Drinking water, toiletries are all wont be provided and you have to manage on your own. Just okay for one day stay.

text.text:
Pros:
Reception staffs are very nice.

Cons:
No water to drink
No towel
No bathing soap
If you open your room door after 6pm 1000 mosquitoes will enter your room but they will not give you any mosquito liquid or coil.
Bathroom is just ok, no water sprayer in latrine.
No lift facilities.
AC is ok.
They have charged 2016rs per day for 3 persons for AC room but i think it's not worth for the amount they charged

text.text: Clean and good ,need to improve the service  response level .

text.text: Very good customer service and support kindly tearting as special guest

originalText.text: Very good customer service and support kindly tearting as special guest

text.text:
I strongly not recommend this hotel to anyone as I got very bad experience here. Booked 7 rooms recently and below are my reasons to avoid this hotel.

1. They didn’t provide the rooms on time during check-in rather waited for more than 5 hours to get the same after a hectic travel. No proper reason provided. Same happened during checkout. Waited for half an hour.
2. Increased cost from 1300 for a standard room to 1650 telling the reason that it is festival time.
3. Charging 2.5 % extra if you pay through credit card which is very bad for a business providing non quality rooms.
4. Unhealthy, filthy rooms and toilets with no exhaust if you choose standard room with A/C. When asked to clean only literal sweep is done rather than a deep clean.
5. No blankets for A/C room, No basic itineraries like soap, etc. They are telling the reason that blankets went for wash and will not be provided.
6. You can find lot of mosquitoes, Spiders, Insects as your roommates.
7. You can get cigarette smoke smell in rooms, corridors in all floors.
8. No proper knowledge for the manager as they are saying that they are new here and cannot address any of the concerns reported.

Since I had a hectic travel and temple visits didn’t argue much with the owner when I reported these concerns. Please avoid this hotel when you are planning to visit Bhavani.

Suggestion to management - Please maintain proper hotel etiquettes if you want to grow your business or people will suffer like me paying higher costs by simply seeing the Google reviews.

originalText.text:
I strongly not recommend this hotel to anyone as I got very bad experience here. Booked 7 rooms recently and below are my reasons to avoid this hotel.

1. They didn’t provide the rooms on time during check-in rather waited for more than 5 hours to get the same after a hectic travel. No proper reason provided. Same happened during checkout. Waited for half an hour.
2. Increased cost from 1300 for a standard room to 1650 telling the reason that it is festival time.
3. Charging 2.5 % extra if you pay through credit card which is very bad for a business providing non quality rooms.
4. Unhealthy, filthy rooms and toilets with no exhaust if you choose standard room with A/C. When asked to clean only literal sweep is done rather than a deep clean.
5. No blankets for A/C room, No basic itineraries like soap, etc. They are telling the reason that blankets went for wash and will not be provided.
6. You can find lot of mosquitoes, Spiders, Insects as your roommates.
7. You can get cigarette smoke smell in rooms, corridors in all floors.
8. No proper knowledge for the manager as they are saying that they are new here and cannot address any of the concerns reported.

Since I had a hectic travel and temple visits didn’t argue much with the owner when I reported these concerns. Please avoid this hotel when you are planning to visit Bhavani.

text.text: Rooms is very good. Neat and clean. Location is near to Sangameshwarar Temple in Bhavani. Worth for Money that I have Spent in this Hotel.Well maintained and had such a comfortable and pleasant stay. Staff were courteous. We get good breakfast and lunch in the restaurant opp to this hotel. So walkable distance for immediate needs. I would highly recommend this hotel for families and business trips.

text.text:
Very clean and new rooms , esp the restroom was was brand new and clean. Well maintained.
We stayed for a break journey for a couple of hours and had such a comfortable and pleasant stay. Staff were courteous. We get good breakfast and lunch in the restaurant opp to this hotel. So walkable distance for immediate needs. I would highly recommend this hotel for families and business trips.

text.text:
Overall, a very pleasant experience. It's a new hotel so the room was clean. Just a few things that need improvement. Door needs to be fixed. More thought could have gone into the planning but not a big deal. The bathroom accessories were of high quality (German). Heater was good.
Wifi worked well. Even Netflix was available. Reception staff very courteous and helpful. Great location as shops are close by. Lovely vegetarian restaurant just opp the hotel. Cheap and good food. Had no issues. Ramraj store close by was fantastic too with service. Of course, being of walking distance to the fascinating Sangameshwarar temple was a huge plus point.
Vardha Inn is a gem in Bavani if you are looking for a comfortable and stress free stay.
